otherNames: Monster But Wild, 怎么办! 我穿越成了最弱小野怪, 区区不才，在下野怪
synopsis: "Azure" is a popular online game that has been active for ten years running. I'm a veteran who's been playing since launch, and I got a huge prize! After opening the gift... I was transmigrated into the game as the weakest little monster!
